publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3254# Sarah Boyack: Action Plan on Organic Food and Farming for Scotland—That the Parliament notes that the sale of organic food in the UK, including Scotland, is increasing faster than in any other European country; further notes that Scotland is well-suited to organic food production; welcomes the adoption by the devolved administrations in Wales and Northern Ireland of ambitious action plans to expand organic food production, the preparation of a plan by Her Majesty's Government and its support for the development of a European Union plan, and considers that the Scottish Executive should support consumers and producers by preparing an action plan on organic food and farming for Scotland.

*S1M-3254# Sarah Boyack: Action Plan on Organic Food and Farming for Scotland—That the Parliament notes that the sale of organic food in the UK, including Scotland, is increasing faster than in any other European country; further notes that Scotland is well-suited to organic food production; welcomes the adoption by the devolved administrations in Wales and Northern Ireland of ambitious action plans to expand organic food production*; further notes* the preparation of a plan by Her Majesty's Government and its support for the development of a European Union plan, and considers that the Scottish Executive should support consumers and producers by preparing an action plan on organic food and farming for Scotland. Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe*, Jackie Baillie*, Trish Godman*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Rhoda Grant*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3254# Action Plan on Organic Food and Farming for Scotland (lodged on 26 June 2002) Angus MacKay*, Robin Harper*, Donald Gorrie*, Helen Eadie*, Mr John McAllion*
S1M-3254# Action Plan on Organic Food and Farming for Scotland (lodged on 26 June 2002) Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*
S1M-3254# Action Plan on Organic Food and Farming for Scotland (lodged on 26 June 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-3254# Action Plan on Organic Food and Farming for Scotland (lodged on 26 June 2002) Susan Deacon*, Maureen Macmillan*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3254# Action Plan on Organic Food and Farming for Scotland (lodged on 26 June 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3254# Action Plan on Organic Food and Farming for Scotland (lodged on 26 June 2002) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-3254# Action Plan on Organic Food and Farming for Scotland (lodged on 26 June 2002) Elaine Smith*
S1M-3254# Action Plan on Organic Food and Farming for Scotland (lodged on 26 June 2002) Karen Gillon*
S1M-3254# Action Plan on Organic Food and Farming for Scotland (lodged on 26 June 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*
